{"name":"Data Protection & Security Team","role_description":"The Data Protection & Security Team is responsible for ensuring the protection of personal data during events and purchases. {"name":"Secure Data Manager","role_description":"Manages protocol-protected data records on our homepage, ensuring compliance with security protocols and maintaining user trust through secure access controls."}
